publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4803 Richard Lochhead: Forres Wins Britain in Bloom Award—That the Parliament congratulates Forres in Moray for winning the award for the best medium town at the Britain in Bloom Awards 2006; commends the residents of Forres for the hard work and dedication required to achieve this highly prestigious award, and recognises that the award is a great asset to the town and will provide a boost to tourism and the area’s image.

S2M-4803 Forres Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Eleanor Scott*, John Swinburne*, Bruce Crawford*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4803 Forres Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Phil Gallie*, Donald Gorrie*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Fergus Ewing*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4803 Forres Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-4803 Forres Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Robin Harper*
S2M-4803 Forres Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Alex Johnstone*
